E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/14/1989
Subject: Progress of Robb Nen
Dear Sir,
Robb Nen has an ERA of 3.32 at A Augusta Pirates!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/16/1989
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Gary Redus



Date: Monday, 6/16/1989
Subject: Progress of Dave Eiland
Dear Sir,
Dave Eiland has nothing more to prove at A Augusta Pirates!
He has an ERA of 3.75 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 7/5/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Kent Hrbek
